attributes.title: This app is weird and horrible
attributes.review: This app to hours to download when I have enough storage on my iPhone and my iCloud got hacked from this app ppl who is giving it a 5 star umm ur weird 😡 don’t download this app it will hack ur system!! 😱

attributes.title: AWFUL APP RUN BY RACIST PEOPLE
attributes.review: I despise this app. It’s promoting the campaign of some racist guy that thinks he can win this election and also wants to ban tik tok because he’s butthurt about not enough people coming to his rally. Sorry sweetie people just don’t like you and recognize your stupidity:/

attributes.title: racist
attributes.review: i was excited to support my president, but when i opened the app, it asked for my race. provided that i am black, i entered that i was african american. immediately, the app shut down and i have been unable to open it since then. i have even tried shutting down my phone, deleting the app and reinstalling it, and factory resetting my phone. i want to support my president but for some reason my race is a problem! 😽✨

attributes.title: Terrible do not download this app
attributes.review: Terrible absolutely terrible but you don’t need my phone number to to make me sign in what I want to contact people with it you don’t need my phone number

attributes.title: LAME APP!!
attributes.review: This app is LAME!!! If I wanted to waste precious seconds of life, I would just assume hold my breath and try not to pass out. And, I’d STILL have more fun than this app will allow!! What a waste of time & energy. I know this app is free, but I still feel like someone owes me a REFUND! BYE!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I don’t even know how to explain this, I have absolutely no words to describe how unbelievably terrible, I believe this app should be banned for telling lies and keeping secrets from the word. This app is terribly stupid and should be taken down.

attributes.title: AWFUL *do not recommend*
attributes.review: First and foremost, the app took soo long to download not to mention the amount of storage it used up. Upon entering my personal information, I received an email from the Trump Administration threatening to kill my cat. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I could almost feel my IQ drop immediately after downloading it. I almost started thinking that COVID-19 was just like the flu and almost denied the fact that over 3 mill Americans have been infected. 😱

attributes.title: Ugh this is the worst
attributes.review: This app took literally 2 days to download. It repeatedly asked for my number even though I submitted it. It kept crashing and never worked. Download at your own risk. 🤷‍♀️✊

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Once I put my phone number in I started getting a bunch of spam calls, I had people saying they were gonna hack all my information, completely unacceptable 👎😤😤
